verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy mighty love O God constraineth me As some strong tide it presseth on its way Seeking a channel in my self-bound soul Yearning to sweep all barriers away{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shall I not yield to that constraining power Shall I not say O tide of love flow in My God Thy gentleness hath conquered me Life cannot be as it hath hither been{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Break through my nature mighty heavenly love Clear every avenue of thought and brain Flood my affections purify my will Let nothing but thine own pure life remain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thus wholly mastered and possessed by God Forth from my life spontaneous and free Shall flow a stream of tenderness and grace Loving because God loved eternally{/lang-eng}
